name: HSPC_HIS_COMP_QUESTIONS
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Hospice Item Set - Z0400 Questions Completed (I LHO 910) item.

columns.name: DATASET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the data set record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: QUESTION_ID
columns.description: This item tracks which HIS questions a given user filled out on a given date. This correlates directly to item Z0400 on the HIS. For each separate date that a given user edits an HIS dataset, a separate line is filed in the Dataset record.
